feed.title: Rocket.Chat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Rocket.Chat: 7.2.4
entry.content:
Engine versions

  • Node: 20.18.0
  • MongoDB: 5.0, 6.0, 7.0
  • Apps-Engine: 1.48.1

Patch Changes

  • Bump @rocket.chat/meteor version.

  • (#35321 by @dionisio-bot) Prevent a bug that caused all sessions being marked as logged out if some required value was missing due to a race condition.

  • Updated dependencies []:

    • @rocket.chat/core-typings@7.2.4
    • @rocket.chat/rest-typings@7.2.4
    • @rocket.chat/license@1.0.6
    • @rocket.chat/omnichannel-services@0.3.12
    • @rocket.chat/pdf-worker@0.2.12
    • @rocket.chat/presence@0.2.15
    • @rocket.chat/api-client@0.2.15
    • @rocket.chat/apps@0.2.6
    • @rocket.chat/core-services@0.7.7
    • @rocket.chat/cron@0.1.15
    • @rocket.chat/freeswitch@1.1.4
    • @rocket.chat/fuselage-ui-kit@14.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/gazzodown@14.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/model-typings@1.2.4
    • @rocket.chat/ui-contexts@14.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/server-cloud-communication@0.0.2
    • @rocket.chat/network-broker@0.1.7
    • @rocket.chat/models@1.1.4
    • @rocket.chat/ui-theming@0.4.1
    • @rocket.chat/ui-avatar@10.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/ui-client@14.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/ui-video-conf@14.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/ui-voip@4.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/web-ui-registration@14.0.4
    • @rocket.chat/instance-status@0.1.15

entry.title: New release for Rocket.Chat: 7.0.9
entry.content:
Engine versions

  • Node: 20.17.0
  • MongoDB: 5.0, 6.0, 7.0
  • Apps-Engine: undefined

Patch Changes

  • Bump @rocket.chat/meteor version.

  • (#35358 by @dionisio-bot) Fixes an issue where room's file list would incorrectly display incoming messages as files.

  • (#35354 by @dionisio-bot) Fixes omnichannel transcript filename breaking download links

  • Updated dependencies [4ad5aefcfa]:

    • @rocket.chat/omnichannel-services@0.3.15
    • @rocket.chat/pdf-worker@0.2.15

entry.title: New release for Rocket.Chat: 7.1.5
entry.content:
Engine versions

  • Node: 20.18.0
  • MongoDB: 5.0, 6.0, 7.0

Patch Changes

  • Bump @rocket.chat/meteor version.

entry.title: New release for Rocket.Chat: 7.2.5
entry.content:
Engine versions

  • Node: 20.18.0
  • MongoDB: 5.0, 6.0, 7.0
  • Apps-Engine: 1.48.1

Patch Changes

  • Bump @rocket.chat/meteor version.

entry.title: New release for Rocket.Chat: 7.3.3
entry.content:
Engine versions

  • Node: 22.11.0
  • MongoDB: 5.0, 6.0, 7.0
  • Apps-Engine: 1.48.2

Patch Changes

  • Bump @rocket.chat/meteor version.

  • Add a retry mechanism to get supported versions from Cloud

  • (#35353 by @dionisio-bot) Fixes omnichannel transcript filename breaking download links

  • Updated dependencies [b2d71461a6a73157024e4594cc1228419a34673e]:

    • @rocket.chat/omnichannel-services@0.3.13
